text: @EpsilonTheory Are CDC"s restrictive testing criteria for coronavirus driven by politicization of the agency, to keep numbers low to make Trump look good, or simply by a lack of adequate supplies of testing kits in the United States, which would have the same effect of under-reporting?

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
